title: DocExtract
description: A website specializing in a variety of document and graphic processing services. The site offers solutions for extracting text from PDF and Word files, converting SVG graphics to image formats, and extracting images from Word documents.
caracteristicas: Text extraction from PDF and Word files.
Conversion of SVG graphics to image formats.
Conversion of images to PDF and Word files.
Extraction of images from Word documents.
Optimization of images of different sizes.
Download of processed files in a ZIP archive.

title: ImageOptiWeb
description: Optimizer and converter of images to WebP format for faster loading and saving space without compromising quality. Our advanced compression technology ensures that your images are lighter, maintaining sharpness and details.
caracteristicas: Efficient compression without loss of quality.
Easily generate optimized URLs for sharing.
Download the optimized images in a ZIP file.

title: UnderowordLiellaNovels
description: This site offers a wide variety of light novels for your enjoyment, it also provides a complete and easy-to-use administration panel. With the panel, you can upload, modify, and delete novels, manage users, change the content of the website, and adjust the site settings to your liking.
caracteristicas: Upload images to the ImageOptiWeb Api.
Activity notifications on the website via email to the group creator.

title: ShigastuTranslations
description: This site offers a wide variety of light novels for your enjoyment, it also provides a complete and easy-to-use administration panel. With the panel, you can upload, modify, and delete novels, manage users, change the content of the website, and adjust the site's settings to your liking.

title: BodaGlam
description: BodaGlam is your comprehensive platform for managing and viewing posts related to weddings and glamorous events. With a powerful API on the backend, our platform offers two distinct but complementary interfaces: one created in Astro for a smooth and attractive post viewing experience, and another developed in React for complete account and post management.
caracteristicas: Filter and search posts by categories.
Enjoy fast and seamless navigation between posts.
React interface for Account and Posts Management.
Sign up and access your BodaGlam account to manage your posts and user profile.
Publish, update, delete, and change the status of your posts easily and quickly.
Manage your user profile, update your personal information, change your password, and more.
Use of JsonWebTokens for authentication and route protection.
We use the BodaGlam API on the backend to provide updated data and ensure a seamless experience in both viewing and managing posts.
Intuitive and easy-to-use user interface design on both interfaces.

title: ChatVis
description: Discover a new way to understand your conversations in real time. My site offers advanced analysis and detailed visualizations to explore the flow of messages, identify key themes, and simulate interactions. With innovative features like the keyword cloud and the use of artificial intelligence, our tool provides you with a complete view of your chats in an instant.

title: MedManagerHub
description: Manage your patients efficiently and securely with my website. With features such as adding, removing, and updating patients, as well as the ability to modify your data and change the password, we keep your medical records organized and up to date.
caracteristicas: Add new patients to the system.
Password recovery via email to facilitate secure access.
Update user data, such as contact information or address.
Update patient information, such as personal data, medical history, etc.

title: Sneakers
description: A online shoe store, where you will find a wide selection of the latest fashion sneakers for the whole family! Explore our product catalog, which includes a variety of brands, styles, and sizes to meet your footwear needs. From casual sneakers to high-tech sports models, we have everything you need to look great and feel comfortable on any occasion.
caracteristicas: Wide variety of sneakers for men, women, and children.
High-quality images of each pair of sneakers from different angles.
Detailed descriptions, materials, features, and shoe care.
Functionality to add to the shopping cart quickly and easily.
Clear display of cart contents and option to modify quantity or delete products.
Special offers section and highlighted discounts on selected products.

title: MultiFrom
description: A form validator and membership process. On this platform, you can enter your personal information, select a membership plan that suits your needs, and easily complete the registration process. Our intuitive interface will guide you step by step, ensuring that each field is completed correctly before moving on to the next section. Once you have entered your information and selected your plan, you will receive detailed information about the benefits of each membership. Finally, you will complete the registration process with total confidence and security.
caracteristicas: Option to go back without losing current data.

title: Perfect home
description: A reliable site in home maintenance services, dedicated to making your life easier and your home more comfortable. On its homepage, you will find detailed information about who they are, the services they offer, and the available plans to meet your needs. In addition, you are provided with a clear location so you can easily find us and take advantage of their services wherever you are.
